Introduction

Kim Jiwoong (or simply Jiwoong), formerly known as King and Ji Nam, is a South Korean singer and actor under Nest Management. He is a member of the boy group ZEROBASEONE and a former member of the boy groups ATEEN and INX. He is also a former member of the pre-debut group B.I.T.

He is best known for being a contestant on the reality survival shows Burn Up 30 and Boys Planet.
